title: David Harbour
summary: David Kenneth Harbour (born April 10, 1975) is an American actor. He gained recognition for his portrayal of Jim Hopper in the Netflix science fiction drama series Stranger Things (2016â€“present),[2] for which he earned a Critics' Choice Television Award in 2018.[3] For the role, he also received Primetime Emmy Award and Golden Globe Award nominations.[4][5]
